item.title: Assignment A01: GGPLOT2
item.description: The Effect of Vitamin C on Tooth Growth in Guinea Pigs In this blog we are going to show the effect of providing vitamin C on the growth of the odontoblasts of 60 guinea pigs. Keywords: Odontoblasts: cells responsible for tooth growth Ascorbic acid: a form of vitamin C and coded as VC. Each pig received one of three dose levels of vitamin C which are: 0.
